title: Instructional Design Scenarios for Remote Career Counseling and Spatial Ability Development

context.prior_knowledge: General understanding of foundational educational psychology and spatial cognition concepts
context.additional_context: An LMS-based asynchronous learning program designed to strengthen career guidance competencies and integrate spatial ability development for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the importance of utilizing spatial ability in at least three ways during the career counseling process.
Learners can write case analysis reports using an LMS platform and incorporate peer feedback at an 80% or higher rate.
Learners can complete assignments visualizing the relationships between spatial concepts (points, lines, planes, dimensions) using 3D modeling tools at a 90% or higher rate.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
